scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && cp -R src/. build/
scripts.start-build: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.publish-patch: npm version patch && npm publish && git push
scripts.publish-minor: npm version minor && npm publish && git push
scripts.publish-major: npm version major && npm publish && git push
scripts.docker-local: npm run build && docker-compose build && docker-compose up --exit-code-from ledsrv || docker-compose down && docker volume prune -f && docker image prune -f
